[00:00.00]On The Ground - ROSÉ (로제)
[00:00.31]Lyrics by：Amy Allen/Jon Bellion/Jorgen Odegard/Raúl Cubina/TEDDY/Rosé
[00:00.62]Composed by：Jorgen Odegard/ojivolta/TEDDY/Jon Bellion/24
[00:00.93]My life's been magic seems fantastic
[00:03.62]I used to have a hole in the wall with a mattress
[00:06.15]It's funny when you want it
[00:07.58]Suddenly you have it
[00:08.60]You find out that your gold's just plastic
[00:10.70]Every day every night
[00:13.11]I've been thinking back on you and I
[00:15.71]Every day every night
[00:18.46]
[00:19.13]I worked my whole life
[00:21.38]Just to get right just to be like
[00:25.78]Look at me I'm never coming down
[00:29.29]I worked my whole life
[00:31.32]Just to get high just to realize
[00:35.87]Everything I need is on the
[00:38.37]Everything I need is on the ground
[00:41.74]
[00:45.59]On the ground
[00:46.75]
[00:48.71]Everything I need is on the ground
[00:51.54]Nah but they don't hear me though
[00:53.21]Yeah what goes up it must come down
[00:56.56]Nah but they don't hear me though
[00:58.31]You're running out of time
[01:01.48]My world's been hectic seems electric
[01:04.19]But I've been waking up with your voice in my head
[01:06.60]And I'm trying to send a message
[01:07.95]And let you know that every single minute I'm without you I regret it
[01:11.27]Every day every night
[01:13.64]I've been thinking back on you and I
[01:16.23]Every day every night
[01:18.92]
[01:19.77]I worked my whole life
[01:22.02]Just to get right just to be like
[01:25.87]
[01:26.38]Look at me I'm never coming down
[01:29.93]I worked my whole life
[01:32.13]Just to get high just to realize
[01:36.52]Everything I need is on the
[01:39.19]Everything I need is on the ground
[01:42.20]
[01:46.12]On the ground
[01:47.24]
[01:49.28]Everything I need is on the ground
[01:52.29]Nah but they don't hear me though
[01:53.88]Yeah what goes up it must come down
[01:57.22]Nah but they don't hear me though
[01:58.97]You're running out of time
[02:02.13]
[02:02.99]I'm way up in the clouds
[02:05.32]And they say I've made it now
[02:07.68]But I figured it out
[02:09.51]Everything I need is on the ground
[02:13.17]Just drove by your house
[02:15.21]
[02:15.71]So far from you now
[02:17.80]But I figured it out
[02:19.58]Everything I need is on the
[02:22.08]Everything I need is on the ground
[02:25.17]

[02:30.27]

data.trans:
[ti:On The Ground]
[ar:ROSÉ (로제)]
[al:-R-]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.31]//
[00:00.62]//
[00:00.93]我的生活就像魔法 令人感到无比美妙
[00:03.62]曾经我家徒四壁 勉强能够遮风挡雨
[00:06.15]可笑 你想要的东西
[00:07.58]突然之间得到
[00:08.60]结果发现一切浮华都是假象
[00:10.70]每一个日日夜夜
[00:13.11]我都在回想你我之间的过往
[00:15.71]每一个日日夜夜
[00:19.13]我穷尽一生
[00:21.38]只想要快乐 只想好好过
[00:25.78]看看我 我永远不会坠落
[00:29.29]我穷尽一生
[00:31.32]只想高飞 最后发现
[00:35.87]我需要的一切就在
[00:38.37]我需要的一切就在我眼前
[00:45.59]就在我眼前
[00:48.71]我需要的一切就在我眼前
[00:51.54]但他们听不到我的声音
[00:53.21]有起必定会有落
[00:56.56]但他们听不到我的声音
[00:58.31]你的时间已不多
[01:01.48]我的世界熙熙攘攘 令人感到兴奋无比
[01:04.19]可我醒来时脑海里总是回荡着你的声音
[01:06.60]我想给你发个信息
[01:07.95]告诉你 没有你的每一分钟 我都悔恨万千
[01:11.27]每一个日日夜夜
[01:13.64]我都在回想你我之间的过往
[01:16.23]每一个日日夜夜
[01:19.77]我穷尽一生
[01:22.02]只想要快乐 只想好好过
[01:26.38]看看我 我永远不会坠落
[01:29.93]我穷尽一生
[01:32.13]只想高飞 最后发现
[01:36.52]我需要的一切就在
[01:39.19]我需要的一切就在我眼前
[01:46.12]就在我眼前
[01:49.28]我需要的一切就在我眼前
[01:52.29]但他们听不到我的声音
[01:53.88]有起必定会有落
[01:57.22]但他们听不到我的声音
[01:58.97]你的时间已不多
[02:02.99]我仿佛身处云端
[02:05.32]他们说我已经功成名就
[02:07.68]但我已经明白
[02:09.51]我需要的一切就在我眼前
[02:13.17]开车经过你家
[02:15.71]如今与你甚是遥远
[02:17.80]但我已经明白
[02:19.58]我需要的一切就在
[02:22.08]我需要的一切就在我眼前
[02:29.16]就在我眼前
